title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta. In a bowl, mix eggs and cheese. Fry pancetta until crispy. Combine everything and season with salt and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill until cooked. Cook tomato puree with cream and season. Combine with chicken.
